html: Jehovah “forsakes” those of the Jacob/Israel category who, instead of repenting and ascending to the Zion/Jerusalem category, choose alternative oracles to his. Those who were “your people”—expressing the covenant formula (Exodus 6:7; Leviticus 26:12)—now follow the customs of the peoples round about against which Moses had warned (Deuteronomy 12:29-31; 31:16-18). Jehovah’s covenants with his people comprehend all the divine knowledge a people can possibly attain. To turn to pagan sources for spiritual enlightenment is to cut oneself off from the light that Jehovah personifies (v 5).
